name: tldr
title: Trusted Linker Download Redirect (TLDR) Support
description:
Adds support for the TLDR (Trusted Linker Download Redirect) HTTP extension.  

Allows Firefox to verify that downloaded files that are linked to by a trusted HTTPS site have not been tampered with.  Visit https://www.bennish.net/tldr/ for test links and to learn more.
author: Ben Kennish <ben@kennish.net>

preferences.name: showNotificationOnValidate
preferences.title: Notify on validate
preferences.description: Show a notification when a download using TLDR validates successfully

preferences.name: requireHTTPS
preferences.title: Require HTTPS for TLDR
preferences.description: Require TLDR linkers to use HTTPS (recommended)
